TITLE: Śivadharmottara chapter 2
TR: As many letters are in the manuscript of the knowledge of Śiva, so many thousand years the donor will live in the town of Śiva.
NOTE: This is the place for the notes...
TEXT: daśa pūrvān samuddhṛtya daśa vaṃśyāṃś ca paścimān |
TR: Having rescued ten ancestors and the ten descendants, having brought to Heaven [his] mother, father and lawful wife, he will attain Śiva.
